creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description: inside wooden box with inscriptions; wrapped in tissue; light green fabric; image of dark mountains with fog in background and small waterfall in foreground; inscription UR corner
inscription: 興到畫山水　清音獨自知　請君試掛壁　或有雲起時 (When inspiration comes I paint landscapes, / a pure music I alone understand. / I ask you, Sir, try hanging one on your wall: / a time may come when clouds will rise from it.) [Jonathan Chaves]
markings: poem UR red seal: 无心 {mushin} [mushin #3]; poem LL red seals: 字曰子徳 {azana iwaku Shitoku}, 静處 {seisho} [seisho #3]; LLC red seal: [stylized butterfly]
signed: 昭和乙亥夏日古道人畫并題 {Shōwa kinoto-i kajitsu Kodōjin ga narabini dai} (Summer day in 1935, painting and title by Kodōjin)
title: Landscape after Mi Fu
